text: Digitization (US), digitisation (UK) is converting information into a digital (computer-readable) form. In this way, the information is organized into bits.Definition of digitization at WhatIs.com"Digitization/digitisation" in Collins English Dictionary The data is put in the form of binary numbers. This helps computer processing. The meaning of digitizing is the conversion of analog source material into a numerical format. == References == Category:Digital signal processing
title: Digitalization
